name: VR Wipeout
description:
VR Wipeout is a first-person virtual reality assault course video game focused on the player competing in various courses to achieve high scores while surviving the onslaught of multiple obstacles included in the game! From humongous wrecking balls or deadly cannons, the player is in for a ride playing VR Wipeout! 

Courses: 

In VR Wipeout, there are four unique levels what capture the assault course experience in virtual reality, Hill Dash, Mega-Sweep, The Balancer and The Impersonator all offer a unique variety of obstacles to face and truly capture the experience of assault courses. There are also more courses in VR Wipeout, the tutorial level shows the user how to play and the multiplayer level allows you to play the course with friends! Controls:

Equipment Used:

VR Wipeout is currently in development using the Oculus Rift S headset, Unity Engine and XR Interaction Tool to create a dynamic and exciting experience on the assault course game genre, the game uses XR Interaction Toolkit package to provide support to all PC-compatible VR headsets and plans to include game support for headsets such as the Oculus Quest 2, the All-in-One VR headset.
